title: Ticket #1806: Missing = causing condor_submit to ignore part of attribute value
description:
If the equals sign is left out of a line in a submit file, condor_submit will silently ignore any text leading up to any subsequent equals sign in the attribute value. This can lead to successful job submission with incorrect attribute values.

For example, if this appears in a submit file: 

periodic_remove NumHolds >= 3

The job is submitted successfully with the following appearing in the job ad: 

PeriodicRemove = 3
remarks:
2010-Dec-14 16:55:50 by jfrey:
Pushed fix to master for 7.5.6.
